metadata.title: CVE-2015-4844 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 6u101, 7u85, and 8u60, and JavaSE Embedded 8u51, allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality,integrity, and availability via unknown vectors related to 2D.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4844` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

openjdk-8-demo - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-jamvm - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u66-b17-1build1
openjdk-8-source - 8u66-b17-1build1
No subscription required

libicu55 - 55.1-7ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '8u66-b17-1build1').
icu package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '55.1-7ubuntu0.1').
